text: Dusra ekjon sorgodoth ahise, tai suna laga bati bhal gundh pora bhorta kori kene thaka dhori thakise, aru bedi usorte khara hoi kene thakise. Bisi mitha sugandh taike dise kelemane tai pora he etu daan koribo, sob pobitro manu khan laga prathana loi kene, utu suna laga bedi te juntu singhason usorte ase.
